browser_does_not_support_video: Your browser does not support the video tag
who_is_lucky_one: Who's the lucky one? What's the occasion? What's your budget? Give us some details to start the magic.
done_with_details: Done with the details? Great! Now just hit the magic button and let us do the heavy lifting.
voila_gift_ideas: Voila! Here's your personalized list of gift ideas, crafted just for you by our AI.
user_friendly_interface: Our user-friendly interface makes finding the perfect gift as easy as pie. No fuss, no muss.
personalized_gift_ideas: Our AI crafts a personalized list of gift ideas based on the unique details you provide. No more generic gift suggestions!
comfortable_in_english_or_spanish: Whether you're more comfortable in English or Spanish, we've got you covered.
day_or_night_we_got_the_look: Day or Night, We've Got the Look
choose_light_dark_theme: Choose between our light and dark themes for the perfect browsing experience, any time of day.
add_to_favorites: See something you like? Add it to your favorites and come back to it anytime. Just remember to sign in first!
ready_to_find_gift: Ready to find the perfect gift?
storm_of_gift_ideas: A storm of personalized gift ideas at your fingertips
essential_cookies_text: Essential cookies are used for service functionality, and optional cookies to enhance your experience and analyze site traffic.
